entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
